hero.title:
Discover the First
Social Listening Platform
in Morocco
hero.subTitle: In-Talks is the first Moroccan platform dedicated to real-time monitoring of online conversations, powered by Artificial Intelligence.

faq.title: Have Questions About in-Talks?
faq.description: You’re in the right place. Here are the answers to the most frequently asked questions about our social listening platform.
faq.q1-answer: in-Talks is Morocco’s first AI-powered social listening platform, helping brands monitor conversations, analyze trends, and uncover actionable insights.
faq.q2-question: How can I track my brand mentions?
faq.q2-answer: Simply set up keywords, hashtags, or brand names in your dashboard and receive real-time updates on all mentions.
faq.q3-question: Which brands can benefit from in-Talks?
faq.q3-answer: Any brand, agency, or organization aiming to understand its audience, competitors, and market trends can benefit from in-Talks.
faq.q4-question: How does the platform help prevent crises?
faq.q4-answer: Our real-time alerts notify you whenever negative sentiment spikes or unusual activity is detected, helping you act before a crisis escalates.
faq.q5-question: What kind of statistics can I access?
faq.q5-answer: Get sentiment analysis, engagement trends, top influencers, trending topics, and detailed reports ready for your marketing or PR team.

earlyBird.title: Real Insights Through a Local Approach
earlyBird.description: Benefit from a platform specifically designed for the Moroccan market, offering localized monitoring, cultural insights, and tailored analytics for brands and agencies.
earlyBird.content: Be among the first to access exclusive data, AI-powered analysis, and real-time alerts to understand and anticipate market trends.
